name: Reach Metaverse
description:
Reach out and touch the future

Come explore what Reach metaverse has to offer. Virtual reality metaverse with NFTs hosted on the Cardano blockchain. 

Reach is built to me platform independent meaning you can login and interact from PC, mobile, or VR headset.

Currently under development the first city is being built and you con explore much that has already been constructed. NFT property in unique districts will be on sale soon as well as land surrounding the city

Coming soon:

Full body physics
Vehicles
Full inventory
placeable item
customizable lands
NFT property
Questlines
Resources gathering in an explorable worlds
NFT item creation with in game effects

Our website is the best place to find updates about upcoming sales and releases. https://reachmetaverse.net/

If you would like access to the VR portion of the please reach out on our website to apply for our closed VR beta. https://forms.gle/63NEgvCqj2SBUpvw6

https://www.reddit.com/r/ReachMetaverse/
